page.title: 02Burnaston
page.content: The{Burnaston}area is a small village with many fields surrounding the buildings.There are several public footpaths.There are two roads making a Y junction to make one road when going into{Burnaston.}One is called Burnaston Lane.There are a few houses but nowhere near as many as in Findern.{Burnaston House}is the main building which is on the left hand side of Burnaston Lane.It covers alot of land but it is quite a distance from the house to the village.Also at Burnaston is a{disused aerodrome}used in the Second World War.{Burnaston } {aerodrome}was mentioned in a recent television programme about a bomber pilot.There are two nurseries near the A38.The fields near Burnaston are used for various purposes.Some are used for grazing,others for crops and some have grass grown for silage or hay.
